org.lenskit.knn.item.model

Class SimilarityMatrixModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.knn.item.model.SimilarityMatrixModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, ItemItemModel

    @DefaultProvider(value=ItemItemModelBuilder.class)
@Shareable
public class SimilarityMatrixModel
extends Object
implements Serializable, ItemItemModel

    Item-item similarity model using an in-memory similarity matrix.

    These similarities are post-normalization, so code using them should use the same normalizations used by the builder to make use of the similarity scores.

    Since:
    0.10
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getNeighbors

        @Nonnull
public SparseVector getNeighbors(long item)
        Description copied from interface: ItemItemModel

        Get the neighbors of an item scored by similarity. This is the corresponding row of the item-item similarity matrix (see org.grouplens.lenskit.knn.item).

        Specified by:
        getNeighbors in interface ItemItemModel
        Parameters:
        item - The item to get the neighborhood for.
        Returns:
        The row of the similarity matrix. If the item is unknown, an empty vector is returned.
